entries.name: request
entries.desc: The parent request for this activation request.

entries.name: new(spec, request)
entries.desc: Creates a new ActivationRequest that will activate spec.  The parent request is used to provide diagnostics in case of conflicts.

entries.name: development?()
entries.desc: Is this activation request for a development dependency?

entries.name: download(path)
entries.desc: Downloads a gem at path and returns the file path.

entries.name: full_name()
entries.desc: The full name of the specification to be activated.

entries.name: full_spec()
entries.desc: The Gem::Specification for this activation request.

entries.name: installed?()
entries.desc: True if the requested gem has already been installed.

entries.name: name()
entries.desc: The name of this activation request's specification

entries.name: parent()
entries.desc: Return the ActivationRequest that contained the dependency that we were activated for.

entries.name: platform()
entries.desc: The platform of this activation request's specification

entries.name: version()
entries.desc: The version of this activation request's specification
